description: As the worst-hit northern region sees improvements, concerns are growing over poorer southern areas.
title: Coronavirus: Fears over rapid spread in Italy's south
title_page: Coronavirus: Fears over rapid spread in Italy's south - BBC News
maintext: "At this point there is the real prospect that Lombardy's tragedy is about to become the south's tragedy," he said. "We are on the eve of a major expansion of infections which may not be sustainable."
